title: How to Create a Freerice Account

steps.headline: Navigate to the Freerice home page.
Click Sign Up at the top of the screen.
Enter your desired username, your e-mail address, and your date of birth.
Enter captcha code to verify and click Register.
Check your e-mail to confirm your account within 48 hours.
steps.description: The e-mail should be from WFP.Freerice, and the subject should be "Freerice.com account details."

steps.headline: Click on the one-time log in link.
Fill out your profile.
steps.description: If you are under the age of 14, you can only change your password when creating your profile.

tyn: A computer with an internet connection
text:
Navigate to the Freerice home page. Click Sign Up at the top of the screen. Enter your desired username, your e-mail address, and your date of birth. Uncheck the boxes if you would not like to join the Farnsworth Art Museum group or receive hunger newsletters via e-mail. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/12/Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/12/Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet1.jpg/aid2215233-v4-728px-Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} If you are under the age of 14, keep in mind that your parents have to approve your account before you can use it. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f3/Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/f/f3/Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet2.jpg/aid2215233-v4-728px-Create-a-Freerice-Account-Step-3Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Enter captcha code to verify and click Register. Check your e-mail to confirm your account within 48 hours. The e-mail should be from WFP.Freerice, and the subject should be "Freerice.com account details." Click on the one-time log in link. Select Log in. Fill out your profile. If you are under the age of 14, you can only change your password when creating your profile. Click Save.
sentences: Navigate to the Freerice home page.
Click Sign Up at the top of the screen.
Enter your desired username, your e-mail address, and your date of birth.
Uncheck the boxes if you would not like to join the Farnsworth Art Museum group or receive hunger newsletters via e-mail.

Check your e-mail to confirm your account within 48 hours.
The e-mail should be from WFP.Freerice, and the subject should be "Freerice.com account details."
Click on the one-time log in link.
If you are under the age of 14, you can only change your password when creating your profile.
